Pre-Game Insights: Morel has hit a team-best 21 home runs. He has 57 RBI.
Morel has recorded a hit 80 times this season in 140 games played (57.1%), including 19 multi-hit games (13.6%).
Morel has homered in 14.3% of his games this season (140 contests), leaving the ballpark in 3.7% of his plate appearances.
Morel has gone down on strikes at least once 97 times this season in 140 games played (69.3%), including 46 times striking out multiple times (32.9%).
Morel has faced Ben Lively 3 times, going 0-for-3 both in 2023 and in 2024.
Ben Lively has a 4.01 ERA and 7.2 Ks per nine innings across 26 games this season, while allowing a batting average of.243 to opposing batters.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Christopher Morel will take the field for the Tampa Bay Rays versus Ben Lively and the Cleveland Guardians on Sunday.
First pitch is at 1:40 PM ET on BSSUN.
The game will be streamed live on Fubo.
